trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que identifica exclusivamente o <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que identifica exclusivamente o <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que descreve a funcionalidade do <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que descreve a funcionalidade do elemento.

trans-unit.source: This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: Essa cadeia de caracteres geralmente retorna o mesmo texto que é fornecido na dica de ferramenta para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> que é o destino de <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> para o elemento que é o destino de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> controle, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> método pode recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> que está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
